sentences.en: Although I advise that you refrain from decoding XML documents with ad hoc routines, I have no qualms about writing.
sentences.cn: 虽然我建议您避免使用特殊的例程解码 XML 文档，但是对于写入 XML 没有这样的疑虑。

sentences.en: Can you refrain from laughter, my friends?
sentences.cn: 各位不要大笑, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: How shall I refrain from tears when we part?
sentences.cn: 我们分手时,我怎么能抑制住眼泪?

sentences.en: I made a terrific effort to refrain from tears.
If they refrain therefrom, clothe them and feed them suitably.
sentences.cn: 如果她们从此悔改,就适当地给她们衣食.

sentences.en: Mrs. Hardie refrained from making any comment.
sentences.cn: 哈迪太太忍住了没做任何评论。

sentences.en: Our proposal met with the constant refrain that the company could not afford it.
sentences.cn: 我们的提议所得到的答复就是那句说了一遍又一遍的老话——“公司负担不起费用”。

sentences.en: Please refrain from feeding the monkeys.
Please refrain from smoking during the performance.
Please refrain from smoking in this area.
Refrain from using such coarse language.
sentences.cn: 别使用这样的粗俗的语言.

sentences.en: She couldn't refrain from smiling through tears.
The boys'refrain came faintly up to Wilson like a nursery rhyme.
sentences.cn: 小孩们像唱儿歌似地反复喊着一句话,隐隐约约地传进威尔逊的耳朵里.

sentences.en: The child is old enough to refrain from bitting the thermometer.
sentences.cn: 这个小孩年龄较大,能控制自己不咬坏体温表.

sentences.en: They agreed to maintain production and refrain from severe wage reductions.
sentences.cn: 他们同意维持生产,禁止大量削减工资.

sentences.en: When breaking in an engine, you probably should refrain from high speed for the first thousand miles.
sentences.cn: 当磨合发动机时，最初的1,000英里里程内尽量不要高速行驶。

sentences.en: Will you all join in singing the refrain, please ?
sentences.cn: 请大家一道来唱副歌好 吗 ?

sentences.en: You should refrain your tongue from backbiting.

trans.tran_cn: （诗歌的）叠句，副歌，经常重复的评价（或抱怨）
trans.tran_en: part of a song or poem that is repeated, especially at the end of each  verse
